name: v1.40.0
body:
## Changelog

86720f2 Merge branch 'master' into release-3.14.0
0fba8ba Merge branch 'master' into release-3.14.0
afab00a Merge branches 'release-3.14.0' and 'release-3.14.0' of github.com:aporeto-inc/tg into release-3.14.0
138f59e added goreleaser
d13ca9b fix golang windows cert store bug - need to check list of RootCAs plus allow Windows APIs to be called to dynamically load root CA if necessary (#20)
284060b fix golang windows cert store bug - need to check list of RootCAs plus allow Windows APIs to be called to dynamically load root CA if necessary (#21)
e137f3e fixed: clean up makefile event more
39186fc fixed: deprecated go 1.12 build
8701522 fixed: lint and sec
8697fbd fixed: simplify makefile and use it
e9ba8f2 fixed: style
3cc231c fixed: typo
abc7ad3 go.mod: update
e10f466 new/travis: build on go 1.14 ref aporeto-inc/aporeto#2700
ff16c87 new: use go sec
49e4a3e provide Windows impl of system cert pool (#19)
ea4a19f remod: update dependencies
